content.p: An easy-to-use, web-based system designed to decrease the administrative burden of managing the research lifecycle. The Research Information System (RIS) is a university-wide service available to researchers across our UK campuses. The aim of RIS is to replace the numerous, existing research management systems with a single integrated platform. Benefits include: Post-docs, researchers, research management staff. Free at the point of use. Research Information System Login If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
